snippet: Despite its stellar record, Golden State’s recent losses and defensive troubles could make it vulnerable to the Cavaliers, who have won nine of their last 10 games.
lead_paragraph: Despite its stellar record, Golden State’s recent losses and defensive troubles could make it vulnerable to the Cavaliers, who have won nine of their last 10 games.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game of the Week: Warriors at Cavaliers
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Game of the Week: Warriors at Cavaliers
